## Projects

[Maternal Impact](_posts/maternal-impact/index.html)

Exploring the NLSY dataset and observing how maternal IQ and family advantage work together to influence child development.

[Democratic Scale](_posts/democratic-scale/index.html)

Analysing valid votes per constituency across the UK countries to understand democratic representation scale differences.

[Political Communications: A/B Testing and Treatment Effects](_posts/political-communications/index.html)

An analysis of digital political messaging to determine how different homepage versions influence supporter signup rates across demographics.
